meanings.definition: A type of pasta with large, ridged tubes
meanings.sent1: I cooked rigatoni for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The rigatoni pasta was delicious with the creamy sauce.
meanings.sent3: The rigatoni tubes looked like little tunnels on my plate.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as curly as a bowl of rigatoni pasta.
meanings.sent5: The rigatoni pasta was so big and ridged, it reminded me of a rollercoaster.

meanings.definition: A dish made with rigatoni pasta, typically served with sauce and cheese
meanings.sent1: My mom's baked rigatoni is my favorite comfort food.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's rigatoni was a flavorful blend of cheese and sauce.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my fork in the rigatoni, creating a cheesy mess.
meanings.sent4: The rigatoni dish was a symphony of flavors dancing on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bubbling rigatoni filled the kitchen with warmth and comfort.
